original: 'od ni dpag tshad ya phrag gcig dang 'bum phrag brgyad do //
analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad ya phrag gcig dang 'bum phrag brgyad do //

original: yab ni legs bzang zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yab ni legs bzang zhes bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Fine Goodness;

original: yum ni gnas mo zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yum ni gnas mo zhes bya'o //

original: sras ni srog ldan zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sras ni srog ldan zhes bya'o //
translated: His son will be called Endowed with Life;

original: rim gro pa ni blo ldan zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rim gro pa ni blo ldan zhes bya'o //
translated: his principal attendant will be known as Endowed with Mind.

original: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mig lta zhis bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mig lta zhis bya'o //

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu rtsal blo gros zhes bya'o //

original: 'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos ther 'bum drug cu'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos ther 'bum drug cu'o //
translated: In his first assembly will be six h u n d red million disciples;

analyzed: bzhi pa la ni ther 'bum dgu bcu'o //

analyzed: lnga pa la ni ther 'bum brgyad 'o //

analyzed: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo sum khri drug stong ngo //

analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri drug stong gi bar du gnas so //

analyzed: mchod rten ni brgyad khri bzhi stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mthu thob skye ba'i yul ni bkod pa mtha' yas shes bya'o // rigs ni rgyal rigs so //

translated: and there will be thirty-six times ten million fine stupas.

original: 'jig rten mgon po bzang po byin pa yi //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon po bzang po byin pa yi //
translated: (372) The Protector of the World, Bhadrapradana,

original: skye ba'i yul ni padma'i tog ces bya //🔽rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni padma'i tog ces bya // rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
translated: will have as birthplace the land called Lotus Peak.

original: dpag tshad bcu gnyis yab ni phung po bzang //
analyzed: dpag tshad bcu gnyis yab ni phung po bzang //
translated: He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for twelve yojanas. His father’s name will be Fine Aggregate;

original: nyi ma'i rgyud ces bya ba yum yin no //
analyzed: nyi ma'i rgyud ces bya ba yum yin no //
translated: his m other’s, Sun Lineage.

original: sras po tshangs dga' grub pa rim gro pa; ;lha yis mchod ces bya ba mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: sras po tshangs dga' grub pa rim gro pa; ;lha yis mchod ces bya ba mkhas pa ste //
translated: His son will be known as Joy of the Gods; his principal attendant will be known as Accomplished.

original: gsal ba gti mug med pa rdzu 'phrul can //
analyzed: gsal ba gti mug med pa rdzu 'phrul can //
translated: The one of skill will be known as Worshipped by Gods; the one with miraculous abilities will be known as Clear and Without Ignorance.

original: 'dus pa dag ni lan grangs sum cu ste //
analyzed: 'dus pa dag ni lan grangs sum cu ste //
translated: He will hold thirty assemblies, each numbering seventy-three times ten million

original: 'dus pa kun la'ang rgyal sras thams cad dag /🔽bye ba phrag ni bdun bcu gsum gsum yod //
analyzed: 'dus pa kun la'ang rgyal sras thams cad dag / bye ba phrag ni bdun bcu gsum gsum yod //
translated: of bodhisattvas who are all without exception🔽on the same level.

original: sku tshe lo grangs 'dus du tshad par 'gyur //
analyzed: sku tshe lo grangs 'dus du tshad par 'gyur //
translated: His life will span seventy thousand years,

original: mtshungs pa med pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
analyzed: mtshungs pa med pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
translated: and even after the nirvana of this unequaled one,

original: dam chos lo grangs bdun cu'i bar du gnas //
analyzed: dam chos lo grangs bdun cu'i bar du gnas //
translated: the holy Dharma will remain for seventy years.

original: bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
translated: After the nirvana of this Sugata,

original: sku gdung rgyas 'gyur mchod rten bzhi bzhi 'byung //🔽mi yi 'dren pa bde gshegs zla ba yi //
analyzed: sku gdung rgyas 'gyur mchod rten bzhi bzhi 'byung // mi yi 'dren pa bde gshegs zla ba yi //
translated: there will be extensive relics and four times ten million stupas.

original: skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid sprul ces bya //🔽rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid sprul ces bya // rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
translated: (1) The Sugata Candra will have as birthplace the land called Radiance of Emanations.

original: dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni tog bzangs @260b yin //
analyzed: dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni tog bzangs @260b yin //
translated: This Jina will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for one hundred yojanas. His father’s name will be Fine Topknot;

original: bzang ldan ma ni rgyal yum sras pa ni //
analyzed: bzang ldan ma ni rgyal yum sras pa ni //
translated: the mother of the Jina will be known as Lady of Goodness. His son will be known as

original: rtse sman yan lag mnyam pa rim gro pa //
analyzed: rtse sman yan lag mnyam pa rim gro pa //
translated: His son will be called Fine Mind; his principal attendant will be known as Equal Branches.

original: yon tan tshogs shes bya ba mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: yon tan tshogs shes bya ba mkhas pa ste //
translated: The one of skill will be known as Accumulation of Good Qualities;

original: mngon par 'phags pa'i lha ni rdzu 'phrul can; ;drang srong chen po'i sras po chags med pa //🔽sems zhi ri dang mtshungs pa thams cad dag /
analyzed: mngon par 'phags pa'i lha ni rdzu 'phrul can; ;drang srong chen po'i sras po chags med pa // sems zhi ri dang mtshungs pa thams cad dag /
translated: the one with miraculous abilities will be known as God of Great Height.🔽This Jina’s first assembly will number sixty-six times ten million contemplatives;

original: 'dus pa lan grangs drug cu rtsa drug 'dus //
analyzed: 'dus pa lan grangs drug cu rtsa drug 'dus //
translated: the second, sixty-five; the third, sixty-four.

original: mi tshe lo grangs nyi shu rtsa yang gnyis; ;grangs pa mtha' yas de yi dam chos dag /
analyzed: mi tshe lo grangs nyi shu rtsa yang gnyis; ;grangs pa mtha' yas de yi dam chos dag /
translated: The human life span will be twenty-two thousand years, and after the nirvana of this one who has arrived at the final goal,

original: lo grangs sum brgya tshad ba'i bar du gnas //🔽rgyal ba'i mchod rten bzang po gcig yin te //
analyzed: lo grangs sum brgya tshad ba'i bar du gnas // rgyal ba'i mchod rten bzang po gcig yin te //

original: dpag tshad brgyad pa kun tu mdzes pa yin //
analyzed: dpag tshad brgyad pa kun tu mdzes pa yin //
translated: There will be a single relic of this Jina, and a single stupa extending for eight yojanas🔽and beautified all around.

original: bde bar gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs de yi //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs de yi //
translated: The Sugata Brahmaghosa

original: skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba'i dbyangs zhes bya //🔽rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba'i dbyangs zhes bya // rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad //

original: dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni na tshod bzang //
analyzed: dpag tshad dgu yod yab ni na tshod bzang //
translated: This Jina will be of priestly descent, and his light will extend for nine yojanas. His father’s name will be Good Age;

original: lha dga' zhes ni bya ba yum yin no //
analyzed: lha dga' zhes ni bya ba yum yin no //
translated: the mother of the Jina will be known as Joy of Gods.

original: sras po dga' bo dul ba rim gro ba //
analyzed: sras po dga' bo dul ba rim gro ba //
translated: His son will be known as Joyful; his principal attendant will be known as Peaceful.

original: yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya mkhas pa ste //
translated: The one of skill will be known as Ocean of Virtue;

original: ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa rdzu 'phrul can //
analyzed: ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa rdzu 'phrul can //
translated: the one with miraculous abilities will be known as Miraculous Display of Awareness.

original: 'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang //🔽tha ba med cing zhi dul dga' ba po //
analyzed: 'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang // tha ba med cing zhi dul dga' ba po //
translated: He will hold eighty assemblies, each numbering

original: bsam gtan pa ni bye ba bye ba yod //
analyzed: bsam gtan pa ni bye ba bye ba yod //
translated: ten million contemplatives who are free of the afflictions, who are peaceful and disciplined, and who delight in the Dharma.

original: mi tshe lo grangs stong phrag bcu drug yin //
analyzed: mi tshe lo grangs stong phrag bcu drug yin //
translated: The human life span will be sixteen thousand years,

original: dam chos lo grangs dag ni brgyad khrir gnas //
analyzed: dam chos lo grangs dag ni brgyad khrir gnas //

original: rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la //
translated: The relics of this Jina will be extensive,

original: mchod rten grangs ni brgyad khri tshang pa ste //
analyzed: mchod rten grangs ni brgyad khri tshang pa ste //

analyzed: rin @261a *// chen rgyal mtshan dra ba dag gis g-yogs //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i zla ba yi //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i zla ba yi //

original: skya ba'i yul ni rtag tu mthong zhes bya //🔽rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad //
analyzed: skya ba'i yul ni rtag tu mthong zhes bya // rigs ni rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad //
translated: will have as birthplace the land called Always Seen.🔽He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for ninety-two yojanas.

original: dgu bcu gnyis yod yab ni legs byin yin //
analyzed: dgu bcu gnyis yod yab ni legs byin yin //
translated: His father’s name will be Fine Gift;

original: sangs rgyas blo gros yum yan sras po ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas blo gros yum yan sras po ni //
translated: the mother of the Jina will be known as Mind of the Buddha.

original: mig mi mthun ba zla ba rim gro pa; ;rab tu brgyan pa'i gzi brjid blo ldan te //
analyzed: mig mi mthun ba zla ba rim gro pa; ;rab tu brgyan pa'i gzi brjid blo ldan te //

original: rnam par nges zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //
analyzed: rnam par nges zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //
translated: The one with miraculous abilities will be known as Certainty.

original: 'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang //🔽'jig rten chags med g-yo med nga med pa //
analyzed: 'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang // 'jig rten chags med g-yo med nga med pa //
translated: He will hold eighty assemblies, each numbering

original: 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa ni gsum gsum yod //
analyzed: 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa ni gsum gsum yod //
translated: sixty-three hundred thousand of those who are free of worldly attachment, free of worldly turmoil, and free of worldly pride.

original: mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin //
analyzed: mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgyad khri yin //
translated: The human life span will be eighty thousand years,

original: mgon po mchog ma mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
analyzed: mgon po mchog ma mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
translated: and after the nirvana of this most excellent protector,

analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs stong du gnas // rgyal ba'i sku gdung ril gcig mchod rten gcig /
translated: the holy Dharma will remain for one thousand years.

original: dpag tshad gsum pa rgyal mtshan dag gis brgyan //
analyzed: dpag tshad gsum pa rgyal mtshan dag gis brgyan //
translated: There will be a single relic of this Jina, and a single stupa extending for three yojanas and ornamented with victory banners.

original: sangs rgyas mtshungs pa med pa dpal dag gi /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mtshungs pa med pa dpal dag gi /
translated: The Unequaled Buddha, Śrībhadra,

original: skye ba'i yul ni 'jig rten mdzes shes bya //🔽rgyal brgya la rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni 'jig rten mdzes shes bya // rgyal brgya la rigs yin te 'od kyi tshad //
translated: will have as birthplace the land called Beautiful World.

original: dpag tshad gcig yod yab ni mya ngan med //
analyzed: dpag tshad gcig yod yab ni mya ngan med //
translated: This Jina will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for one yojana. His father’s nam e will be No Sorrow;

original: sdug dga' zhes bya yum yin sras po ni //
analyzed: sdug dga' zhes bya yum yin sras po ni //
translated: his m other’s, Joy of Beauty. His son will be known as Joy of Virtue; his principal attendant will be known as Joy of Merit.

original: 'tsher ba med pa dga' ba rim gro pa //🔽skye ba'i mchod ces bya ba mkhas pa ste //🔽rgol ba 'joms shes bya ba rdzu 'phrul @261b can; ;'dus pa lan grangs bzhi brgya brgyad cu ste //🔽kun la'ang 'dam rdzab dra ba mun spangs pa //
analyzed: 'tsher ba med pa dga' ba rim gro pa // skye ba'i mchod ces bya ba mkhas pa ste // rgol ba 'joms shes bya ba rdzu 'phrul @261b can; ;'dus pa lan grangs bzhi brgya brgyad cu ste // kun la'ang 'dam rdzab dra ba mun spangs pa //
translated: The one with certain joy will be the one with certain joy.🔽The one known as Jātipuṣpa will be skilled,🔽and the one known as Conqueror of Opposition will have miraculous abilities.🔽He will hold four hundred and eighty assemblies, each numbering🔽one hundred times the number of dust particles in one three-thousand-fold world system.🔽

original: rdul bral srid las grol ba sha stag 'dus //
analyzed: rdul bral srid las grol ba sha stag 'dus //
translated: He will hold forty-eight assemblies, each numbering four hundred and eighty times ten million of those who have abandoned the net of the mire of existence, who are free from dust, and who are liberated from existence.

original: mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgya yang yin //
analyzed: mi tshe lo grangs dag ni brgya yang yin //
translated: The human life span will be one hundred years,

original: mgon po mchog ma mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
analyzed: mgon po mchog ma mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
translated: and after the nirvana of this Best of Men,

original: dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs brgyad cur gnas //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo grangs brgyad cur gnas //
translated: the holy Dharma will remain for eighty years.

original: rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la //
translated: The relics of this Jina will be extensive,

original: mchod rten bzang po drug khri drug stong 'byung //🔽'jig rten mkhyen pa legs par skyes pa yi //
analyzed: mchod rten bzang po drug khri drug stong 'byung // 'jig rten mkhyen pa legs par skyes pa yi //
translated: and there will be sixty-six thousand fine stupas.

original: skye ba'i yul ni des pa zhes kyang bya //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni des pa zhes kyang bya //
translated: (The Buddha) Sumati will have as birthplace the land called Good Birth.

original: rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad; ;bye ba bdun cu yab ni bdag nyid che //
analyzed: rgyal ba rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad; ;bye ba bdun cu yab ni bdag nyid che //
translated: This Jina will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for seventy million yojanas.

original: 'od skyod ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum //
analyzed: 'od skyod ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Great Being; the m other of the Jina will be known as Lady of Light.

original: sras po glog 'od drag shul rim gro ba //
analyzed: sras po glog 'od drag shul rim gro ba //
translated: His son will be called Light of Lightning; his principal attendant will be known as Strength.

original: yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya mkhas pa ste; ;skyon sel ba zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //
analyzed: yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya mkhas pa ste; ;skyon sel ba zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //
translated: The one of skill will be known as Ocean of Virtue; the one with miraculous abilities will be known as Clearing Away Faults.

original: 'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang //
analyzed: 'dus pa lan grangs brgyad cu kun la yang //
translated: He will hold eighty assemblies, each numbering thirty-three times ten million

original: gnas med pha rol phyin pa thams cad po //🔽bye ba phrag ni sum cu gsum gsum yod //
analyzed: gnas med pha rol phyin pa thams cad po // bye ba phrag ni sum cu gsum gsum yod //
translated: of those who have gone beyond to the state of no abode.

original: mi tshe lo grangs dag ni nyis stong yin //
analyzed: mi tshe lo grangs dag ni nyis stong yin //
translated: The human life span will be two thousand years,

original: rgal bar gyur pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang //
analyzed: rgal bar gyur pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang //
translated: and the holy Dharma of this one who has reached the other shore

original: lo grangs sum khri thug stong bar dug nas //
analyzed: lo grangs sum khri thug stong bar dug nas //
translated: will remain a further thirty-three thousand years.

original: rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la //
translated: The relics of this Jina will be extensive,

original: mchod rten bzang po bye ba brgya phrag gsum //🔽sangs rgyas thub pa med pa'i tshogs dag gi /
analyzed: mchod rten bzang po bye ba brgya phrag gsum // sangs rgyas thub pa med pa'i tshogs dag gi /
translated: and there will be three hundred times ten million fine stupas.

original: skye ba'i yul ni mtshan gyis brgyan ces bya //🔽rgyal @262a *// ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni mtshan gyis brgyan ces bya // rgyal @262a *// ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad //
translated: The Buddha Asama­gana will have as birthplace the land called Ornamented by Signs.

original: dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni don yod yin //
analyzed: dpag tshad brgya yod yab ni don yod yin //
translated: He will be of priestly descent, and his light will extend for one hundred yojanas. His father’s nam e will be Purposeful;

original: grangs ldan ma zhes bya ba yum yin no //
analyzed: grangs ldan ma zhes bya ba yum yin no //
translated: his m other’s nam e will be Lady of the Assembly.

original: sras po zla bzang bden pa rim gro ba //🔽stobs kyis 'gro zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: sras po zla bzang bden pa rim gro ba // stobs kyis 'gro zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste //

original: rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul can //
analyzed: rnam par 'phrul ba'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul can //
translated: The one of skill will be known as Going with Strength; the one with miraculous abilities will be known as Brilliance of Miraculous Manifestations.

original: 'dus pa ldan grangs bzhi khri kun la yang //
analyzed: 'dus pa ldan grangs bzhi khri kun la yang //
translated: He will hold four assemblies, each numbering forty thousand

original: srid pa'i 'chir las grol ba thams cad po //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'chir las grol ba thams cad po //
translated: of those who are free from the bondage of existence.

original: drang srong che sras bye ba bye ba yod //
analyzed: drang srong che sras bye ba bye ba yod //
translated: Each of these assemblies will number ten million of the sons of the Great Sage.

original: mi rnams tshe tshad lo grangs bzhi khri yin //
analyzed: mi rnams tshe tshad lo grangs bzhi khri yin //
translated: The human life span will be forty thousand years,

original: 'jig rten bla ma mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
analyzed: 'jig rten bla ma mya ngan 'das nas kyang //
translated: and after the nirvana of this Best of Men,

analyzed: dam chos lo grangs brgyad khri'i bar du gnas // sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur mchod rten grangs //
translated: the holy Dharma will remain a further eighty thousand years.🔽His relics will be extensive, and there will be nine hundred times ten million stupas

analyzed: bye ba brgya phrag dgu yod gser gyis spras // de bzhin gshegs pa grangs pa'i bshes gnyis gyi //

analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni grags pa 'phags shes bya // rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag med //

original: bye ba dgu yod sbyin bsreg 'od 'phro yab //
analyzed: bye ba dgu yod sbyin bsreg 'od 'phro yab //
translated: His father’s name will be Light of Fire;

original: bsod nams can zhes bya ba yum yin no //

analyzed: sras po drang srong kyang 'phags rim gro pa // yon tan bden zhes bya ba mkhas pa ste //

original: bye ba phrag na sum cu bzhi bzhi yod //
analyzed: bye ba phrag na sum cu bzhi bzhi yod //
translated: He will hold sixty-six assemblies, each numbering thirty-four times ten million of those who have destroyed the armies of Mara.

analyzed: @262b mi tshe lo grangs nyi khri cig stong yin //

analyzed: mtshungs pa med pa'i dam pa'i chos dag kyang //
translated: and the holy Dharma of this Unequaled One

original: lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong bar du gnas //
analyzed: lo grangs nyi khri nyis stong bar du gnas //
translated: will remain a further twenty-two thousand years.

original: rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la //
translated: The relics of this Jina will be extensive,

original: mchod rten bzang po bye ba bdun bcu drug /
analyzed: mchod rten bzang po bye ba bdun bcu drug /
translated: and there will be seventy-six times ten million fine stupas.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa zhes bya ba'i //
translated: The Tathagata called Satya

analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni gzi brjid mdzes shes bya // de rigs rgyal rigs yin te 'od dpag tshad //

analyzed: bye ba bcu yod mi yi dbang po yab //
translated: His father’s name will be Lord of Men;

original: skal 'dod ma ni yum yin sras bo ni //
analyzed: skal 'dod ma ni yum yin sras bo ni //
translated: His father’s name will be Fine God; his mother’s, Desire of Fortune.

analyzed: skar mkhan mchog sbyin bzang bo rim gro pa // snyan par grags zhes bya ba shis chen te //

translated: The one of skill will be known as Destroyer of Mara; the one w ith m iraculous abilities will be known as Eliminator of Suffering.

original: bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gsum gsum yod //
analyzed: bye ba phrag ni dgu bcu gsum gsum yod //
translated: He will hold five assemblies, each num bering ninety-three times ten million of those w ho are m entally absorbed in the absence of self and the absence of reproach.

original: mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri sum stong yin //
analyzed: mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri sum stong yin //

original: chos thob pa yi dam pa'i chos dag kyang //
analyzed: chos thob pa yi dam pa'i chos dag kyang //

analyzed: lo grangs nyi khri cig stong bar du gnas //

analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni thams cad 'byor zhes bya // rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od kyi tshad //

analyzed: dpag tshad gsum yod yab ni dos bzangs yin //

analyzed: dga' 'gro ma zhes bya ba yum yin no //

analyzed: sras po rgyal byin lus bzangs rim gro pa //

analyzed: / skyabs mchog rgyal po blo gros ldan pa ste //

original: 'dus pa lan grangs bdun te kun la yang //
analyzed: 'dus pa lan grangs bdun te kun la yang //

analyzed: drang srong gti mug med pa thar dga' ba //

analyzed: bye ba phrag ni bdun cu gsum gsum yod //
